title: 214: How the Houston Texans Use Deshaun Watson
itunes:title: 214: How the Houston Texans Use Deshaun Watson
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks review the great Monday Night Football classic between the Kansas City Chiefs and Washington Redskins (1:35). The guys then tell you how the Houston Texans have set up rookie quarterback Deshaun Watson for success (9:10). DJ and Bucky also welcome on Coach John Lilly to preview the Thursday Night Football matchup between the New England Patriots and Tampa Bay Buccaneers (18:30) before they look back at the weekend that was across college football (25:25).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
